name: Petsr4u
overview:
We are a company, bringing a fresh, new perspective on pets and the companionship they provide. We care about building a community of pet-loving people and giving you, our customer a venue to exchange ideas, learn new things and share stories and photos of pet family members on our web page each month.

Also we are the one-stop source for every pet need you can imagine!What do we do?We bring the store to you. In the comfort of your home, you can select all the things you need to keep your pet happy. We will deliver them right to your door. We are all about YOU and YOUR PET!At our full line pet store, we have a sales staff that is always courteous, helpful and friendly. We strive to know your name, help in loading customer’s purchases, and never make you wait in long lines.

We want to be a place where people and their pets can find what they need and have the BEST shopping experience.At Pets R 4 U, we know that not everyone is completely comfortable shopping on-line, so we also have a telephone number here you can ask questions or place an order. The nice, friendly folks who answer the phone want to help you. You may just have a question or you may prefer to give your order by credit card over the phone. It’s all part of our “Loyalty Our Customers” attitude.

If you need expert advice, our experts are on hand to get you the best information, advice and tips for your pet. Why should you shop with Petsr4u ?We know you can go anywhere to buy the stuff you need for your pet. In order for us to earn your trust, and have you be one of our valued customers, we have to be the best place for you to get EVERYTHING that you need to “love your pet.” And if we don’t live up to your expectations, let us know. Our goal is to make sure you are 100% completely satisfied-and if we haven’t done that, we want to make it right for you. Good or bad, your feedback is extremely important to us. Let me know what you think. Our goal is for you to be a happy, satisfied customer.
